code: import React from'react';import{connect}from"react-redux";import News from"./News";import{addNewsActionCreator}from"../../redux/news-reducer";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{news:state.newsPage.allNews};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{onNewsRemove:function onNewsRemove(id){dispatch(addNewsActionCreator(id));}};};var NewContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(News);export default NewContainer;
